title: allik-kENikkarai tEDi vandoru
sahitya:
allik-kENikkarai tEDi vndoru atishayam enna kANum attiri tavattu 
mecci nattinak-kurippuNartti pattruk-kiru padattum paTrinattiruttum anda


anupallavi

  shollil tavam perukkum tUya uttungA tUyak-kamalattiru tOLaNaiyum arangA 
shelvamaruL Iyum teLLiya singAdiLLiya shol ilavEl en kaNNurangA 
tirai kaDaliDai munamalaindu pOgha shikhara mandaram tanai shumandadu pOgha 
muraNa munam bhuviyai iDandadu pOgha munam iraNiyanuram piLandadu pOgha 
tirumaghaL munam vara aRaNDadu pOgha shiruvan munam shinamum taNIndadu pOgha 
aran ayan amararum paNIndadu pOgha attanaiyum viTTu ingu antarangamAna


caraNam    kaLLamariyAda unnaik-kATTik-koDutta anda gAnamuni nAradaraik-kANa vandIrO 
kAdal valai virittuk-kattum ATTaiyum vaittu kaTTip-piDittAn avanait-tEDi vandIrO 
piLLaik-kari mukhattan peTravan pittanAnAn peNNaik-kaNDu azhaikka nADi vandIrO 
dEvAdi dEvA teLLiya singA tEDit-tEDi inda tiruttalam kANa
